name: GetGroupTargetsForRole
description:
Retrieve group targets for specific admin roles in Okta.

Use this tool to list all group targets for a specified `USER_ADMIN`, `HELP_DESK_ADMIN`, or `GROUP_MEMBERSHIP_ADMIN` role assigned to an admin user. Returns an empty list if the role has no specific group targets.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of an existing Okta user to fetch group targets for.

value_schema.description: ID of an existing Okta user

parameters.name: role_assignment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the role assignment for which to list group targets.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor string for pagination, obtained from the `Link` response header to specify the current location in the list.

value_schema.description: The cursor to use for pagination. It is an opaque string that specifies your current location in the list and is obtained from the `Link` response header. See [Pagination](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/#pagination).

parameters.name: max_results_to_return
parameters.description: The maximum number of group targets to return. Specify an integer value to limit the results.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to return

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the okta API.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The cursor to use for pagination. It is an opaque string that specifies your current location in the list and is obtained from the `Link` response header. See [Pagination](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/#pagination).

value_schema.description: The cursor to use for pagination. It is an opaque string that specifies your current location in the list and is obtained from the `Link` response header. See [Pagination](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/#pagination).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A limit on the number of objects to return

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to return

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of an existing Okta user

value_schema.description: ID of an existing Okta user

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
